Identity.History: Thracian tribesmen who wield the fearsome rhomphaia polearm weapon in combat. They were ubiquitous mercenary swordsmen and skirmishers throughout Hellenistic times, sometimes even serving in two opposing armies.
Identity.Tooltip: Classes: Mercenary Citizen Melee Infantry Swordsman. Counters: 2x vs. Spearmen, 1.5x vs. Elephants. Countered by: Archers, Cavalry Spearmen, and Cavalry Archers.
